text: kisee jeev kee hatya na karo, jise (maarana) allaah ne haraam thaharaaya hai. yah aur baat hai ki haq (nyaay) ka taqaaza yahee ho. aur jisakee anyaayapoorvak hatya kee gaee ho, usake uttaraadhikaaree ko hamane adhikaar diya hai (ki vah hatyaare se badala le sakata hai), kintu vah hatya ke vishay mein seema ka ullanghan na kare. nishchay hee usakee sahaayata kee jaegee
